text: Modibo Keïta (4 June 1915 – 16 May 1977) was the first President of Mali (1960–1968) and the Prime Minister of the Mali Federation. He espoused a form of African socialism. ==References== == Other websites == Category:1915 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Presidents of Mali Category:Prime ministers of Mali
title: Modibo Keïta
